description: This file defines a Quiz Page component for a Lightning.js application, rendering a question with four options and a Next button, handling user interactions, and managing quiz state.

classes.name: default
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the quiz question page, with methods to load questions, handle option selection, and navigate to results.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the current quiz question and options into the component's state.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Handles the selection of an answer option, updating the background colors to indicate selection.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Handles the transition to the next question, updating the score if the answer was correct, or navigating to the results page if the quiz is complete.
